address.deliveryPoint: Botanický ústav SAV, Dúbravská cesta 9, 841 01 Bratislava 4, Slovakia

abstract.para: It gathers complete (domestic or foreign) information of herbarium data, literature data as well as non-published records of non-vascular and vascular plants in Slovakia. It also gathers the herbarium data of plants occurence outside of Slovakia if these are deposited in the Slovak herbaria.
